modnet.model_presets package¶

Submodules¶

modnet.model_presets.presets module¶

This submodule defines some heuristic presets to be used as the first step of hyperparameter optimisation.

modnet.model_presets.presets.gen_presets(n_feat: int, n_samples: int, classification: bool = False) → List[Dict[str, Any]]¶

Generates sensible preset architectures and learning parameters based on number of samples and features.

Parameters

  • n_feat – The number of training features available to the model.

  • n_samples – The number of training samples available to the model.

Returns

List of dictionaries to individually pass as kwargs to model.fit(…).

Module contents¶

This submodule defines some MODNet model presets which are used in the fit_preset function.
